pr_title: [WFLY-10879] Adding new EE deployment phase constant

timeline.bodyText:
@spyrkob Does this need to immediately follow POST_MODULE_EE_CONCURRENT_CONTEXT or just be after and before POST_MODULE_BATCH_ENVIRONMENT?
If the latter, 0x3080 is better.
timeline.author: bstansberry

replies.bodyText:
Updated to 0x3080.
Timing-wise it just need to happen after POST_MODULE_EE_CONCURRENT_CONTEXT and before INSTALL phase
replies.author: spyrkob
